amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove Section 103 of the bill which seeks to privatize a public resource and restore the Secretary of the Interior's discretion over water contract renewals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-405 to remove provisions of the bill that seek to privatize a public resource and restore the Secretary of the Interior's discretion over water contract renewals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 243 (Roll no. 86).
